attributes.action: END THE ABILITY OF MP'S TO SIMPLY CHANGE PARTY WITHOUT HAVING TO BE RE-ELECTED
attributes.background: NUMEROUS MP'S HAVE SIMPLY CHANGED PARTY DURING 2019 WITHOUT BEING ELECTED TO THAT NEW PARTY. THEY CONTINUE TO RECEIVE A SALARY,  CLAIM EXPENSES & VOTE IN PARLIAMENT WHILST THEY ARE STRICTLY, NOT ELECTED MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT. ANY MP WISHING TO MOVE PARTY SHOULD HAVE TO TAKE PART IN A BY ELECTION.
